summary: I loved Homecoming ... but I hope the sequel will surpass it in a way that Winter Soldier surpassed the original. We've already...
caption: I loved Homecoming … but I hope the sequel will surpass it in a way that Winter Soldier surpassed the original. We’ve already got a teen comedy, now it’s time for a more mature film. I kind of want some neo-noir elements to ‘Far From Home’. Here’s an artwork I’ve done.

reblog.comment: I loved Homecoming … but I hope the sequel will surpass it in a way that Winter Soldier surpassed the original. We’ve already got a teen comedy, now it’s time for a more mature film. I kind of want some neo-noir elements to ‘Far From Home’. Here’s an artwork I’ve done.

summary: I'm dying right now because I really want to see ant man and the wasp but here's going to come out only on August 14 and I know...
body:
I’m dying right now because I really want to see ant man and the wasp but here’s going to come out only on August 14 and I know that from now I’m going to see so many spoilers and yeah I hate my life

I’m probably going to see it on streaming with subtitles because I really need to see it

"If there's a light at the end, it's just the sun in your eyes

I know you wanna go to heaven, but you're human tonight."

blog.name: thatstrangemarvelite
blog.title: Caly
blog.description:
hi my name is Caly i love anything and everything Marvel! i write Fan ficton once again about anything and everything Marvel! and i am also an artist!

i love Finn Jones fight me if you dont like him!

body:
hospital visits (Sam Wilson x reader)

You and Sam had been in the army together, together as in you were a nurse and you had patched up him and Riley up many of times so much so that y'all had become friends. After Riley passed you and Sam had remained friends and would go out to bars or someplace to chat and catch up on each others life and when he told you that he was a now working with the avengers you were happy for him and at the same time you told him about leaving the military and going to be a nurse at a hospital.

You mainly left the military for your brother who had passed and his wife needed help with watching your nephew, then your nephew; Chris, was dignosed with cancer, you went to work at the hospital where he was being treated so you could help your sister in-law and nephew.

When Sam called you to set up a day to go through the hospital with Steve, Wanda and Clint you happily agreed to help and you got in touch with your boss and he said it was fine. So after all of that it lead you up to this day of the avengers visting the hospital you work at, thanks to Sam.

When they were to get there you were to take them around the hospital to meet the kids and take pictures with them, when the car pulled up and Sam got out along with Clint, Steve and Wanda you put a smile on your face and went out to greet them. They were all in uniform and seeing Sam back in the Exo-7 was a little strange for you if you were honest.

“I’m y/n l/n, I’ll be the one showing y'all around the hospital” you introduced yourself shaking everyones hand except for Sam. Sam walked up to you and gave you a friendly hug.

“Nice to meet you, Mrs. l/n” Steve said politely

“Oh no I’m not married and just call me y/n” you said, Steve nodded “shall we get going?” Y'all then started y'alls long journey through the hospital and visiting the kids. Each kid that they met you had filled them in on why the kid was in there and the kids name as well.

It wasn’t until y'all were almost done that y'all got to Chris’s room. You informed them on his case, but left out the part of him being you nephew un-initially.

As y'all walked into the room Chris was watching tv and his attention was snapped to the door.

“Aunt y/n!” He said, with a smile as you walked over to him and gave him a hug. Sam had no idea your nephew was here in the hospital. “Is that Falcon?!” He asked his eyes lighting up when Sam walked in with Steve, Wanda and Clint following behind.

He didn’t even give you a chance to answer “no way! Your my favorite superhero” he said

“Well thanks, no offence to the other kids here but they mainly wanted to see Cap, and your the first kid to say that” Sam said sitting in the chair next to Chris’s bed. Sam and Chris’s talked about a lot of stuff, but mainly what it was like to be an avenger. But sadly there where still kids that they needed to see so you had to cut there visit short. After they said goodbye and y'all were out in the hall Sam came up to you as you were at the nurses station to take care of something real quick.

“Why didn’t you tell me your nephew had cancer?” Sam asked a little hurt considering you told each other everything.

“It just never came up i guess” you said puting away a file then walking up to the last door for them to visit with. Sam dropped the subject for now to focus on the task at hand.

blog.name: brooklyn-b
blog.title: Brooklyn Baby
blog.description: Welcome to my blog, Winter Children❤

summary: “Wow,” Natasha raised her brow, amusingly. “Now this side of him, I’ve never seen before.” You sighed as you held Bucky’s...
caption:
“Wow,” Natasha raised her brow, amusingly. “Now this side of him, I’ve never seen before.” You sighed as you held Bucky’s hand. “I know, Tasha neither have I and it’s creeping me out.”

“He’s wearing make up…?” Clint questioningly stated. “Is he wearing your make up, (Y/N)?”

“Yes, I know.” You replied, looking at Bucky as he stared at the ceiling with his mouth agape. “He stole my eyeliner from my makeup kit. He was wearing lipstick too but that…somehow came off.”

“I’m really enjoying this side of Bucky.” Bruce admitted as he momentarily glanced at you from his computer, smirking. You glared at him. “This isn’t funny, you Green Goliath.”

“I mean, these rare abilities should be awarded, (Y/N).” Tony began as he placed a hand on your shoulder not before you smacked it away. “You finally somehow made Manchurian Candidate snap, huh. Not even Steve could’ve achieved this.”

“I’ve had the absolute pleasure in drinking mead of Midgard.” Thor announced proudly. “How bout another, Master Barnes?” 

Natasha stopped the God of Thunder before he could reach the fridge door. “Thor, that is the last thing we want to do.” She said as we all turned to look at Bucky who seemed to be fascinated by his metal fingers whilst he mumbled to himself.

Finally, you looked towards Steve who had been looking at his friend with nothing but concerned eyes. “Bucky?” He tried getting his friend’s attention. Bucky snapped his gaze at his best friend and narrowed his eyes. “Who the hell is Bucky?” 

You rolled your eyes and slumped into the leather couch. “Great.”

blog.name: davidmann95
blog.title: Not Even 50% Of My TRUE Power
blog.description: Comics guy, writer guy, Superman guy

summary: A couple of duds aside - Marc Guggenheim continues to be THE WORST - marvel had a pretty good week, right? The new Cap and...
question: A couple of duds aside - Marc Guggenheim continues to be THE WORST - marvel had a pretty good week, right? The new Cap and Cosmic Ghost Rider were both pretty awesome.
answer: Cap and Cosmic were both winners! With Cap in particular, that was me giving Coates a second chance as a comics writer after his first year on Black Panther failed to grab me, and I’m so glad I did - this feels like the start of something special. As for other Marvel this week, Avengers was more fun but is still a massive disappointment coming from this creative team, Death Of The Inhumans had one or two really offputting moments but it’s Cates so I’m still in, and while Immortal Hulk wasn’t punch-to-the-gut Eisner material the way the first issue was, it’s still easily the best thing Marvel’s putting out and one of the best books coming out of the Big Two period.

As for other Marvel this week, Avengers was more fun but is still a massive disappointment coming from this creative team, Death Of The Inhumans had one or two really offputting moments but it’s Cates so I’m still in, and while Immortal Hulk wasn’t punch-to-the-gut Eisner material the way the first issue was, it’s still easily the best thing Marvel’s putting out and one of the best books coming out of the Big Two period.

body:
Iron Man 3 AU

Tony, a dumbass: *gives his home address to the public and threatens a terrorist*

Tony: *to JARVIS, after he sees people milling about his courtyard* We’re still at ding dong? Come on, we’re supposed to be on total lock down. I just threatened a terrorist.

JARVIS: *deep sigh because his creator is insufferable* There’s only so much I can do when you give out your address publicly, sir.

Tony: *goes to see who it is and sees Rhodey and the Avengers there, in full gear. Even Thor’s there, looking like he probably abandoned a battle on another planet to get to Earth* What the—

Steve: Tony! There you are.

Rhodey, clearly unimpressed and in full armor that includes War Machine’s* really big gun: You’re a dumbass and I’m going to kick your ass after Pepper’s done tearing you a new one.

Clint: Nice digs. I can see why you had us settle for the Tower.

Thor: Yes. But where is the fight? I was promised a glorious battle.

Natasha: *checking her tablet* Twelve o'clock and incoming.

Thor: Say no more. *flies out*

Hulk: *Growls, and follows*

Savin, on the helicopter, watching Thor summon the lighting and Hulk take down another chopper: Oh fuck. We didn’t think this through.

-FIN-

*fuck the Iron Patriot. It doesn’t exist.

blog.name: trammelsb
blog.title: My Inner Child is Tony Stark...
blog.description:
Translator, Expatriate, Writer, Feminist. Atheist. Fandom Old. 
FOREVER IGNORING ENDGAME....Science Bros, Stucky, Rhodey, Loki, Clintasha, Harry Potter (Slytherin), Trek, Star Wars, and whatever.
Tony Stark Defense Squad

blog.name: sarcastictonystark
blog.title: Directing Science Disneyland
blog.description: You have reached the tumblr of Tony Stark. After making Banner get a blog here I finally gave in and made a public one myself. Ask me things or just enjoy the show, choice is yours. I check the tag "sarcastictonystark" and you can @tag me Not currently accepting M!As Currently accepting compliments None of the images are mine, just the words between them. Discord Join Link Links for mobile users: FAQ • Headcanons • Just the asks • Ko-fi

summary: Anyone remember when Loki saved Fendral and the others by giving them warning to not let the Frost giants touch them? And now,...
body: Anyone remember when Loki saved Fendral and the others by giving them warning to not let the Frost giants touch them? And now, ever thought that the price of saving them is Loki knowing his true identity and everything that happen after that?
